Code: EXEC SQL SELECT VALUE(MIN(OCORHIST),0) FROM seguros.v1coberapol WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND NRENDOS = 0 AND NUM_ITEM = :NUM_ITEM AND DATA_INIVIGENCIA <= :DATA_INIVIGENCIA AND DATA_TERVIGENCIA = (SELECT MIN(T2.DATA_TERVIGENCIA) FROM SEGUROS.seguros.v1coberapol T2 WHERE T2.NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND T2.NRENDOS = 0 AND T2.NUM_ITEM = :NUM_ITEM) END SQL
